title: Mathematical Instructional Design through Collaborative Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematical concepts and experience with digital tool applications
context.additional_context: Mixed group of pre-service and in-service teachers requiring the establishment of a collaborative learning environment using digital storytelling tools

learning_goals: Learners can design interactive stories explaining mathematical concepts using collaborative script-based digital storytelling.
Learners can structure mathematical problem-solving processes into storytelling through interactions with peers and experts.
Learners can develop mathematics education scenarios using digital tools and evaluate them through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
